title: Exhibitions
description: Melissa's work is often exhibited in and around Salisbury, and further afield. For current and upcoming exhibitions, see below.

events.title: Wylye Valley Art Trail
events.description: Wylye Valley Art Trail is a ten day festival of visual art and craft in and around the Wylye Valley, South Wiltshire.
events.location: Langford Parish Hall, Wylye Road, Hanging Langford, SP3 4PA

events.title: Picture Salisbury - Salisbury Group of Artists
Plain Arts Exhibition at Salisbury Medical Practice
events.location: Salisbury Medical Practice, Fisherton House, Fountain Way, Wilton Road, Salisbury, SP2 7FD
